entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-09-19
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Complete statement command doesn't work with property initializers #56533
  • MemberNotNullWhenAttribute doesn't work on properties from base class? #56531
  • Eccentric finalization in C# interactive #56529
  • Is it possible to run vs 2019 code analyze by command and not by gui? #56528

Closed

  • Allow Exception to bubble out of IAsyncStateMachine.MoveNext when not called from a continuation #56036

PullRequests

Created

  • Method type inference should make inference from explicit return type #56534
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix #55183: Add SymbolVisitor<TArgument, TResult> #56530
    Area-Compilers, Community
  • Merge main to features/list-patterns #56525
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Run the 'use patterns' analyzer on roslyn itself. #56522
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main-vs-deps to release/dev17.1-preview1-vs-deps #56527
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56524
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56526
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Merge main to features/RawStringLiterals #56537
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #56536
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Avoid several breaking changes in overload resolution from inferred types of lambda expressions and method groups #56341
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Lambda Improvements, 17.0
  • Do not include function type conversions in user-defined conversions #56416
    Area-Compilers
  • EnC/HR interface unification #56424
    Area-Interactive
